page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: { POPULATION Census 1961-3729, 1971-5666, 1981-6673,{ 1985-8000 approx. {MOBILITY OF POPULATION} This survey was carried out over several weeks taking a random selection of the population,male and female aged between 20-over 70 and residing in Lutterworth. {Sex-}Male/Female {Age-}20-over 70 {Years in Lutterworth-}Under 5-over 50 {Reason for moving {Where do people work and shop. We deduced from this survey that people are happy to reside in the Midlands and to work and shop in Lutterworth in the main.Mostly the reason for moving was their family and job.People had come to Lutterworth from within a 25 mile radius and mainly from the north.
